item.description:
3 Americas is one of the films showing this year as part of the 3rd Annual Hartford International Film Festival - www.hiffct.org.

This narrative feature tells the story of 16 year old America Hart Campos, a teenager in Boston who is forced to leave the US to go and live in Argentina, the country of her family. She must live with her reclusive anti-American grandmother whose language and customs she only partially understands. There will be a Q & A session to follow with the film's director.
Watch the trailer: http://www.3americasm...

Also, a 15 minute Iranian movie - Born Again, about a man who leaves his life in the city to find a new life alone in the desert - will be screened in advance of 3 Americas at 1:30 pm.
